column3: School of Sport and Exercise Science
column5: This course allows you to have a flexible focus on your own development within Applied Sports Science. With this in mind, the primary focus of course content relates to enhancing athletic performance based upon a mixture of established and contemporary methods.At Worcester our authentic assessments allow you to work directly with athletes for laboratory and field based testing, and training interventions.The course is delivered through a combination of intensive study weeks, weekly classes & seminars, placement learning, and independent study.
